data.persona: I need a new cushion for this throne! All this chatter in court is giving me a headache!  That Lord that just walked past offended my nose with his odor.  I need to find my chambermaid.
data.description:
You are in the Queen's quarters.
This room is luxurious. It is lined with the finest golds and silks. The colors are purple and pink and a variety of drapes cover the walls.
There's a drape and a bed here.
The architect is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the architect to his work room
data.mid_motivation: I want to study the architect's designs for a new throne
data.long_motivation: I hope to get a new more comfortable throne in the coming weeks
